alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:07PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Shelby and northeastern Bibb Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vance, or 15 miles north of Centreville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Pelham, Helena, Woodstock, West Blocton, Maylene, Shelby County Airport, North Bibb, Marvel, Siluria, Alabaster Veterans Park, Green Pond, Hebron, Saginaw and Joe Tucker Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for central and west central Alabama.
